name: Sound Profiles
desc: An audio profile scheduler app, designed to give you full control over your device's sound settings with precision.

features.headline: Customizable
features.description: Customizable schedules for ringtone, alarm, and media volumes.

features.headline: Time-based triggers
features.description: Set profiles by weeks, days, hours, or minutes.

features.headline: Automatic switching
features.description: Switch audio profiles based on your predefined rules. Ideal for busy professionals, students, and anyone needing seamless sound management.

features_extra: You can schedule your audio profiles by day, week, hour, or even minute, tailoring the volume levels for ringtones, alarms, and media to fit your lifestyle. Create multiple schedules for different days or events, and let the app automatically adjust your sound settings, ensuring your device's volume is always just right. Perfect for those who need a flexible solution to manage sound in various environments without manual adjustments.

reviews.review: I want to deeply thank the developer of this application, it is helping me to be productive like I have never been in my entire life and to make the most of every moment of my day. The event widget is incredible for tracking the day's progress, the interface is intuitive, has few ads and is easy to use, I recommend it to everyone! You can download without fear of being happy!

Really useful and unique 'year progress' countdown timers, along with custom events. I particularly like the all-in-one circular widget which looks great on my home screen. The only change I would like is a larger text option

This app is exactly what I've been looking for! It's fantastic to see the year's progress visualized as a percentage, with widgets that keep it constantly in view. It's a real eye-opener to how quickly time passes. This is a brilliant concept, well-executed by the developer. Thank you for creating such a helpful tool!

faqs.question: How to request more features?
faqs.answer: You can contact us at our email or join our telegram to request any features.

faqs.question: Why does app require exact alarm permission?
faqs.answer: You can import events from the calendars by import them from going to events > tap on three dots in the top > tap on backup & restore > tap import from calendar.
